body:
Junior Mod->User->Referee->Junior Mod->Mod->Mentor->User->Social Media->Referee ->Senior Referee->Referee :)

I saw a lot of staff members and people come and go, and it saddens me that this came so soon. Thank you to all who stuck up for me or had great times with. Avicus was a pretty big part of my life for a while there, overall though I've met so many people, and met up with some in real life, you guys are awesome!


Add me on discord if you wanna hear what my voice sounds like in a year or if you wanna be friends:)


Acceqted//Josh#9214





Adois me amigos!


o yeah this is also an ama
